com.mcc.ul
Class TmrOutSettings

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.TmrOutSettings

public class TmrOutSettings
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the timer output settings of a tmrDevice device. To create an instance of this class, create a reference using new TmrOutSettings(), then set the field values as desired. An instance of this class can also be used to contain the return values from the tmrOutStart() method of TmrDevice.

Field Summary

          The width of the pulse divided by the pulse period.

          The desired square wave frequency in Hz.
 TmrIdleState idleState
          The TmrIdleState of the output.
 double initialDelay
          The amount of time in seconds to wait before starting the timer output.

Field Detail

frequency

public double frequency
The desired square wave frequency in Hz. The timer clock is divided down by integer values to produce the frequency. The actual frequency output is returned. The frequency value is dependent on the timer clock and resolution.

dutyCycle

public double dutyCycle
The width of the pulse divided by the pulse period. This ratio is used with the frequency value to determine the pulse width and the interval between pulses.

pulseCount

public long pulseCount
The number of pulses to generate. Set to zero to continuously generate pulses until tmrOutStop() is called.

initialDelay

public double initialDelay
The amount of time in seconds to wait before starting the timer output.

idleState

public TmrIdleState idleState
The TmrIdleState of the output.

TmrOutSettings

public TmrOutSettings()
